description: Diversify your capital across hundreds of cryptocurrencies in one click and create your unique portfolio. Experience the ease of managing your own capital with our powerful tool and buy/sell assets without the hurdles of going to the exchanges directly.
title: Assets

tooltips.name: Asset name
tooltips.change-24h: Price change over the last 24 hours
tooltips.market-cap: The total market value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply. It is analogous to the free-float capitalization in the stock market.
tooltips.volume-24h: A measure of a cryptocurrency trading volume across all tracked platforms in the last 24 hours. This is tracked on a rolling 24-hour basis with no open/closing times.

popup.tooltip: The funds will be converted according to the current market price (via market order).
